name: displayvideo_advertisers_channels_sites_bulkEdit
description: Bulk edits sites under a single channel. The operation will delete the sites provided in BulkEditSitesRequest.deleted_sites and then create the sites provided in BulkEditSitesRequest.created_sites.

advertiserId.description: The ID of the advertiser that owns the parent channel.

channelId.description: Required. The ID of the parent channel to which the sites belong.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

advertiserId.description: The ID of the advertiser that owns the parent channel.

createdSites.description: The sites to create in batch, specified as a list of Sites.

deletedSites.description: The sites to delete in batch, specified as a list of site url_or_app_ids.

partnerId.description: The ID of the partner that owns the parent channel.

Site.description: A single site. Sites are apps or websites belonging to a channel.

name.description: Output only. The resource name of the site.

urlOrAppId.description: Required. The app ID or URL of the site. Must be UTF-8 encoded with a maximum length of 240 bytes.

$ul: **sites**: The list of sites that have been successfully created. This list will be absent if empty.
